title: LOOKING FOR GROUP GOLD 3
body:
Hey guys i'm looking for a group of friendly players to play Flex que with to have a good time and get better.
i'm a mid lane main but am comfortable on champions in every role (YAY autofill) so add me if you need a 5th would like to play with people around my level please :D

replies.body: Hey, I'm Gold II in solo Q, unranked in Flex, mid/supp main can also adc - add me :)
Gold 4 Support, I'm down to try and get something going.

Hows it going mate
Im G5 in Flex and P5 in Solo/Duo 
Added you
